TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventOpcode extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains an event opcode that is defined in an event provider. An opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class cannot be instantiated. A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata> object defies a list of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode> objects, one for each opcode defined in the provider.
The standard event opcodes are defined in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventOpcode> enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the localized name for an event opcode.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the localized name for an event opcode.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the non-localized name for an event opcode.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the non-localized name for an event opcode.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Integer
public: property int Value { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the numeric value associated with the event opcode.
